channel.title: Comments on: About to buy these, heard Great things about them.

item.description: Give us Gravity Rush 3 u cowards

item.title: By: poopnada

item.description: overrated, cool concept, but lacking in key areas.
item.content:encoded: overrated, cool concept, but lacking in key areas.

item.title: By: threepw00d
item.dc:creator: threepw00d
item.description:
Wouldn't it be best to buy one of them first to check you enjoy it before buying the second game?
Edit: okay never mind, I zoomed in and saw the 50% sale price. Good enough reason to take a chance on both games i guess. Enjoy them!
item.content:encoded:
Wouldn’t it be best to buy one of them first to check you enjoy it before buying the second game?

Edit: okay never mind, I zoomed in and saw the 50% sale price. Good enough reason to take a chance on both games i guess. Enjoy them!

item.title: By: Furimbus
item.dc:creator: Furimbus
item.description:
Just beware that the Gravity Rush 2 servers were shut down, so there’s some multiplayer content that’s no longer playable and some items that are no longer obtainable.
https://www.playstationlifestyle.net/2018/07/19/gravity-rush-2-servers-shut-down-for-good/#/slide/1
item.content:encoded:
Just beware that the Gravity Rush 2 servers were shut down, so there’s some multiplayer content that’s no longer playable and some items that are no longer obtainable.

https://www.playstationlifestyle.net/2018/07/19/gravity-rush-2-servers-shut-down-for-good/#/slide/1

item.title: By: Genderneutralsky
item.dc:creator: Genderneutralsky
item.description: They’re a very fun pair of games. I think some of the wow factor of the original is gone since it was so tied to the vita but still a fantastic game! I loved the second one! It really did so much more with the concept and the world is amazing to just play around in. Be warned though, both games can get very stale around the half way marks while the story settles. Power through and the late game/endings are amazing!
item.content:encoded: They’re a very fun pair of games. I think some of the wow factor of the original is gone since it was so tied to the vita but still a fantastic game! I loved the second one! It really did so much more with the concept and the world is amazing to just play around in. Be warned though, both games can get very stale around the half way marks while the story settles. Power through and the late game/endings are amazing!
